title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 921-1.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 921-1.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth regulations
implementing the New York State Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification
(WARN) Act (Chapter 475 of the laws of 2008), hereinafter "Act," and amendments
thereto, as set forth in § 860 et seq. of the New York State Labor

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
921-1.0

Amended

New

York State Register June 21, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 25, eff. 6/21/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
